title: Best of the Program | Guest: Artur Pawlowski | 4/12/22
description:
Canadian pastor Artur Pawlowski joins Glenn to share the story of his multiple arrests for violating COVID-19 policies and the abuse he endured while in jail. Glenn discusses how fast society has shifted into a filtered reality where everything is okay. Glenn and Stu discuss President Biden’s latest move against "ghost guns" and the regulation of cheese.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
